term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - quantized internal energy
term.title: quantized internal energy

item.text: The quantized internal energy of a molecule in its electronic ground or excited state can be approximated with sufficient accuracy for analytical purposes by: E int = E el + E vib + E rot is the electronic, E vib the vibrational and E rot the rotational energy, respectively.

item.alttext: E int = E el + E vib + E rot
